code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SearchBox(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[name,setName]=useState('');const submitHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();navigate("/search/name/".concat(name));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{className:"search",onSubmit:submitHandler,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"q",id:"q",onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primary",type:"submit",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-search"})})]})});}
